weather_report:
In downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, casting a gentle light on the iconic cityscape. The temperature hovers near a mild 62 degrees, perfect for a stroll through the neighborhoods or a pause at a favorite café. As the sun arcs towards the horizon, the warmth begins to wane, dipping to around 58 in the early evening. A light westerly breeze whispers through the streets at about 7 mph, adding a refreshing touch to the vibrant autumn air. 

As the day transitions into night, clouds will blanket the city, ushering in a cooler evening with temperatures falling to around 49, underlined by a gentle south-southwest breeze. For those venturing out later, a light jacket or sweater will be advisable, protecting against the evening chill while allowing you to enjoy the lingering beauty of the day. Whether it’s a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, a quiet reading at a neighborhood park, or simply soaking in the sights of the city, today offers a splendid blend of calmness and charm—a perfect San Francisco day amid autumn's embrace.
